pageContext.claim: “The one thing with them, they fact-check, but even their fact-checking is wrong. If I'm right, or if I'm 97.3 percent right, they will say he's got a Pinocchio or he's lying. They are bad people.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump doesn't seem to understand the nuances of the Pinocchio scale. One Pinocchio means mostly true, or "some shading of the facts." Fact-checks from reputable organizations are promptly corrected when they’re wrong.
